text: The list of number-one albums in Spain from 1969 to 1979 is derived from the Top 100 España record chart published weekly by PROMUSICAE (Productores de Música de España), a non-profit organization composed by Spain and multinational record companies. Albums are listed chronologically by the date each reached number one on the chart for the first time. ==Number-one albums of the 1970s== {|id=toc class=toc summary=Contents ! |- |align=center|196919701971197219731974197519761977197819791980 → |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !
